change.item: PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::Venezuelan Subject Collection)//EN" "reg_397.sgm" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).
Updated extent statement and date range to include new increment; added unit identification number

titlepage.titleproper: Register of the Venezuelan Subject Collection, 1949-2006
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1998 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Serial issues, pamphlets, leaflets, bulletins, resolutions, and internal documents, relating primarily to political conditions in Venezuela, and to socialist and communist movements in Venezuela.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Venezuelan Subject Collection, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

dsc.head: Collection Contents
dsc.p: See card catalog for increments that may have been received since December 1994

scopecontent.p: Articles, pamphlets, bulletins, serial issues, internal documents and speech, primarily concerning political conditions, foreign policy issues and leftist movements

did.unittitle: General. Serial issue and pamphlets concerning political conditions and foreign policy issues, 1967-1990. Includes speech by Ignacio Ibarren Borges
General. Articles concerning the history of Venezuelan Marxism, workers' movements and leftist parties, n.d..
Movimiento Al Socialismo (MAS). Article, bulletins, internal documents, serial issues, 1972-1974
Partido Comunista de Venezuela (PCV). Serial issues, pamphlets and internal documents, 1966-1977. Includes material from party congress, 1971
Partido Revolucionario Venezolano (PRV). Article detailing ideological conflicts within party

scopecontent.p: This addition to the collection has not yet been described. Please let the Hoover Institution Archives know if you would like to see this material described.
